name: Old World (itch) (diVISION+)
description:
Old World is a project I put together with the aid of the "Action RPG Starter Kit" and Unity.  This playable demo serves as a placeholder for a more ambitious project down the road.

OBJECTIVE

The most powerful enemy in this game is the goblin lord in the dungeon.  Just follow the arches and you'll find the entrance, though you may want to be at least level 5 before you take him on.

(Tip: Press C to access your stat increase screen!)

Once you've done that, congratulations!  You beaten everything the game has to offer!

FEATURES
  • Revamped UI Elements
  • 1x Custom Character
  • 2x Areas to Explore
  • 3x Monster Types
  • 1x Shopping Crystal
  • 4x Items
  • 1x Dialogue NPC
